title: Swarna Kanganam: Floral Diamond Kada Bangle
materials: High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones with Diamond-cut facets.
features: The Kada features a traditional 'vanki' inspired openwork design with stylized floral motifs encrusted with sparkling CZ stones. The design has an intricate pattern around the edges, giving the appearance of 'kesari' (saffron) detailing due to the color and intricate design. It's crafted with a sturdy construction to withstand daily wear while maintaining an elegant aesthetic.
colors: Primary: Yellow Gold; Secondary: White (CZ stones)
occasions: or as a statement piece for a special occasion. A modern twist on a traditional design
making it suitable for contemporary celebrations as well.
description: This Swarna Kanganam (gold bangle) seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern aesthetics. The high-quality CZ stones offer exceptional brilliance and the 22K gold exudes timeless elegance. The sturdy construction ensures durability while the intricate floral design adds a touch of femininity. Perfect for adding a regal touch to any outfit. Experience the brilliance of gold and sparkle without compromise.
